description.p: A tressym was a magical beast resembling a small winged cat. They could be found across the warm and temperate lands of Faer√ªn, and were most common in northern Cormyr, particularly in the village of Eveningstar where they were seen as good luck charms and mascots and praised for keeping down rodents. They were also popular as familiars for good wizards.
Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.
